title: Oregon Candidates Tiptoe Around Health Law
teaser: The Affordable Care Act isn't turning out to be the lightening rod expected, so politicians are taking a more nuanced approach.
contentencoded:
President Obama’s landmark health care legislation, the Affordable Care Act, is playing a significant roll this election season. But the law, also known as Obamacare, isn’t turning out to be the lighting rod expected in Oregon, so local politicians are taking a more nuanced approach.Â From the Here & Now Contributors Network, Kristian Foden-Vencil from Oregon Public Broadcasting reports.

  • Read more on this story via OPB

Reporter

  • Kristian Foden-Vencil, reporter for Oregon Public Broadcasting. He tweets @KristianOPB.
